text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You can't mention Kyoto, without 
talking about their sweets!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And when you talk about sweets, 
you cannot leave out the sakuramochi!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's different from the usual
sakuramochi we get from other places,
butâ€¦

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is also very delicious as it is!! 
We shall replenish our sakura energy 
with these sakuramochis!!
